appetizers.name: P-Cheese Rolls
appetizers.description: Thinly sliced pastrami rolled tightly around our premium cream-cheese. Portion sizes are plates of 5, 10, or 15. Price is per 5 rolls.

appetizers.name: Breadsticks
appetizers.description: Our custom wheat bread and sauce are made here, in shop, every day. Dish includes 10 had rolled breadsticks with a bowl of our family secret garlic sauce.

cold-sandwiches.name: Packed Cali
cold-sandwiches.description: A sandwich perfected through generations. The first sandwich to hit the menu and the base of our legacy. Custom spiced pastrami, provalone, lettuce and your choice of condiments.

cold-sandwiches.name: The Big Club
cold-sandwiches.description: The biggest sandwich on our menu. Thick sliced smoked bacon with lettuce, crunchy tomato and your choice of cheese.

cold-sandwiches.name: Plain Jane
cold-sandwiches.description: All up to you. Craft the perfect sandwich for you with a wide selection of meats and cheeses.

hot-sandwiches.name: Steamin Dreams
hot-sandwiches.description: Float away with this signature hot sandwich. Filled with goodness and cooked in our hot-press.

hot-sandwiches.name: 4-Cheese Please
hot-sandwiches.description: All your cheese needs between two slices, as long as you ask nicely.

desserts.name: Hot Fudge Sunday
desserts.description: Indulge in our handmade ice cream, covered in hot fudge, topped with a delicious cherry.

desserts.name: Fresh Brownie
desserts.description: Try our in house recipie brownies. Your choice between Fudge, Blonde, or Chunky Chocolate!

drinks.name: Ice Cold Soda
drinks.description: Please select from our wide range of beverages. Free refills!

drinks.name: Adult Beverages
drinks.description: Besides all your favorite beer and wine choices, we have our very own craft brew in many flavors. Try one today!
